sentences.en: "It must be very difficult," said Hunter, feeling a surge of embarrassment for Diane's predicament.
sentences.cn: “那肯定不好过，”亨特说，突然为黛安娜的困境感到很为难。

sentences.en: a device that protects your computer against electrical surges
sentences.cn: 一台计算机电涌保护设备

sentences.en: A slow hatred for Hilton began to surge up in him.
sentences.cn: 他心里开始对希尔顿渐生恨意。

sentences.en: A wave surged up towards them.
sentences.cn: 一个浪头向他们涌来。

sentences.en: Adrenalin surged through her veins.
sentences.cn: 她血脉偾张。

sentences.en: Another surge of pain in my ankle caused me to give an involuntary shudder.
sentences.cn: 脚踝突然又一阵疼痛，痛得我直打哆嗦。

sentences.en: He felt a surge of pure adrenaline as he won the race.
sentences.cn: 他赢得比赛时感到一阵激动.

sentences.en: He felt a surge of recklessness.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到一阵不顾一切的冲动。

sentences.en: In that moment a surge of hatred flowed through my blood.
sentences.cn: 那一刻，一股仇恨在我的血液中翻涌。

sentences.en: In the year 1091, London Bridge was destroyed by a tidal surge during a storm.
sentences.cn: 伦敦大桥曾于1091年在一次暴风雨中被汹涌的潮水冲毁。

sentences.en: Recent renewed surge of the dollar has helped send the pound and the French franc to new lows.
sentences.cn: 美元最近的重新增值使英镑和法朗下跌到新的低度.

sentences.en: She could feel anger surging inside her.
sentences.cn: 她感到怒火中烧。

sentences.en: She felt a surge of excitement run through her.
sentences.cn: 她突然觉得浑身激动。

sentences.en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentences.en: The anniversary is bound to bring a new surge of interest in Dylan's work.
sentences.cn: 该周年纪念肯定会再一次激发人们对迪伦作品的浓厚兴趣。

sentences.en: The crowds surge out of the sports stadium.
sentences.cn: 人群从运动场拥出.

sentences.en: The Freedom Party's electoral support surged from just under 10 percent to nearly 17 percent.
sentences.cn: 自由党的选举支持率从只有不到10%剧增到近17%。

sentences.en: The photographers and cameramen surged forward.
sentences.cn: 那些摄影和摄像师们涌向前去。

sentences.en: The slight back and forth motion sent a pounding surge of pain into his skull.
sentences.cn: 轻微的前后晃动让他的脑袋感到一阵剧烈的疼痛。

sentences.en: The surge travelled southwards along the coast.
sentences.cn: 浪涛沿着海岸向南涌去.

sentences.en: The whole car shuddered with an almost frightening surge of power.
sentences.cn: 油门猛然加大到几乎让人恐惧的程度，整个汽车剧烈震颤着。

phrases.tran_cn: 雷电突波；雷电冲击波；雷涌
电涌放电器；冲击吸收器；过电压吸收器；电涌特性喘振特性
贮仓，储料仓；缓冲仓；平衡料仓
[电工学]突波阻抗；特性阻抗；浪涌阻抗
峰值压力；冲击压力；水锤压力
浪涌保护器，浪涌电压保护器
缓冲槽；平衡水箱；通风油箱（等于surge chamber）

trans.tran_cn: 汹涌，激增，大量，奔涌向前
trans.tran_en: a sudden increase in amount or number
if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly

trans.tran_cn: 汹涌，使强烈地感到，激增，飞涨
trans.tran_en: if a feeling surges or surges up, you begin to feel it very strongly
if a large amount of a liquid, electricity, chemical etc surges, it moves very quickly and suddenly

trans.tran_cn: 蜂拥而出；洋溢，奔放；汹涌，奔腾
trans.tran_en: If a crowd of people surge forward, they suddenly move forward together
